name: places/ChIJBfZObFdYwokRsnICet2Wu4s

displayName.text: Urgent Care at NYU Langone Ambulatory Care West Side

formattedAddress: 355 W 52nd St 5th floor, New York, NY 10019, USA

authorAttributions.displayName: Urgent Care at NYU Langone Ambulatory Care West Side

adrFormatAddress: 355 W 52nd St 5th floor, New York, NY 10019, USA

originalText.text: If you don't mind arriving at 2pm on a Saturday with a very sick and coughing spouse and finding it CLOSED, by all means try this place. They do not keep regular hours and don't post the hours that they do keep, and if you happen to arrive when the urgent care is closed you will be set upon by an extremely angry and unwelcoming person at the door yelling, "Closed!". The doors, however, are open, and there is no sign saying that the urgent care is closed or giving the business hours. STAY AWAY. Go to the City MD on 57th between 8th and 9th. City MD posts their hours clearly and treats patients well, both medically and personally.

originalText.text: Horrible experience. Rushed here because I cut myself deep and needed stitches. The doctor refused to see me because they were “too busy”. There was one other patient in the waiting room. Worst medical service I’ve ever experienced. You should shut down.

text.text: Horrible experience. Rushed here because I cut myself deep and needed stitches. The doctor refused to see me because they were “too busy”. There was one other patient in the waiting room. Worst medical service I’ve ever experienced. You should shut down.

originalText.text: I had a wonderful experience at this urgent care and would highly recommend going. I went the night before Thanksgiving expecting a long wait time and crowded waiting room, but ended up being seen 15-20 minutes after arriving. The waiting room only had one other person and social distancing was easily done. The staff and Dr. Bertisch were all incredibly professional, compassionate, and efficient. I was in an out in no time and had a prescription ready for me at my pharmacy when I left. The building itself is very updated and nice. I could not have asked for a better experience

originalText.text: Worst urgent care. They won't run the tests I need. Won't prescribed the medications I need. Will have a completely empty waiting room and not see me. 3rd bad experience today. Avoid this place if possible.

text.text: Worst urgent care. They won't run the tests I need. Won't prescribed the medications I need. Will have a completely empty waiting room and not see me. 3rd bad experience today. Avoid this place if possible.

originalText.text: I had an appalling and terrible experience at this location last night. The male attendant told me I was covered under the insurance I provided them and I made sure to verify it 3 times. However, after having gotten seeing by the physician I was charged $245 BECAUSE APPARENTLY I WAS NOT COVERED BY INSURANCE. I am a college student and this was really sad to hear because I don't have the cost to pay out of pocket. This just shows how incompetently they were and they did nothing worth charging $245 for. Just checked my blood pressure, fever and my ears and throat. The next day, my friend came with me and he spoke to the supervisor and explained the situation and they told us that they will not be charging us because they shouldn't have done that. I am glad my friend was with me because he was there as support and to come off intimidating to the staff in case something like last night happened. PLEASE DON'T GO HERE. THEY DON'T CHECK THE INFORMATION CORRECTLY AND MAKE YOU PAY LATER ON.
